title: Milford home 'torn apart' by thieves
content:
A Milford family came home from a Saturday outing to a house that had been “torn apart” by thieves, Hometown life reported . 
  
Milford police state a sliding glass door was smashed and several rooms in the house were ransacked. 
  
Cash and jewelry were the only things taken, according to police. 
  
The doors to the house were alarmed, but since the sliding glass door was broken instead of being opened, the alarm did not go off.
